name: Baking Bounce
detailed_description: A new year has come to the Beach Bounce resort and with it a new chef, ruffling feathers among the staff, can you get things back on track after a mass walk out by the kitchen staff, or will this be the worst summer for the resort.
about_the_game: A new year has come to the Beach Bounce resort and with it a new chef, ruffling feathers among the staff, can you get things back on track after a mass walk out by the kitchen staff, or will this be the worst summer for the resort.
short_description: A new year has come to the Beach Bounce resort and with it a new chef, ruffling feathers among the staff, can you get things back on track after a mass walk out by the kitchen staff, or will this be the worst summer for the resort.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Gh
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
